## **Tender Details**

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites proposals from engineering consulting firms to provide professional services for the rehabilitation of the waterworks and sewer system at the Montreal Garrison. The contract involves up to 8 lots.

The proposed services include:

* Preparation of a Statement of Requirement and concept
* Design development
* Construction documents
* Assistance during the tender call and construction phases

The objective of this Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP) is to select the proponent with the highest total score.

## **Eligibility Criteria**

Firms that consider themselves qualified to provide these services are invited to submit their Abbreviated Proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date and time indicated on the Electronic Bidding System.

## **Selection Criteria**

* Experience in similar projects
* Technical expertise
* Project management skills

## **Evaluation Criteria**

The proposals will be evaluated based on the established criteria in the RFAP.
